about_the_game:
Worldsmith is a 2D open-world survival/adventure game where you write books to explore unique, procedurally-generated dimensions!

Gamemodes:


Survival: The standard Worldsmith gamemode where death is enabled and the player has to find/craft blocks and items.

Creative: Creative mode disables player death, enables flight, and allows the player free access to all blocks and items in Worldsmith. Great for building and unleashing one's creativity!

Features:


Building: Build anything that you dream of!

Combat: Worldsmith features a combat system utilizing melee, ranged, and magic weapons!

Crafting: Worldsmith features an easy-to-use, list-based crafting system.

Dimensions: There are a near-infinite amount of procedurally-generated dimensions for the player to explore, sometimes with procedurally-generated structures, hostile conditions, and both procedurally-generated and pre-existing (but modified) creatures.

Exploration: Every dimension is open-world with much to explore above and below ground.

Mining: Mine for ores hidden underground and search for treasure!

Modular Spellcrafting: Worldsmith features a fully-modular spellcrafting system where you create your own spells.

Music: Worldsmith OST by Charles A. Debczak.

Player Customization: Detailed character creation screen at world creation. Equipped armor and accessories are visible on the player with additional slots for cosmetic armor.

Player Bloodlines: Play as one of the following bloodlines:
  • Human
  • Undead
  • Dwarf
  • Orc
  • Triton
  • Lizardman
  • Dragonborn
  • Celestial

Singleplayer: Multiplayer is a planned feature.

Steam Workshop: Discover, download, and create content to enhance the Worldsmith experience! Easily add new blocks, items, and more!

content_descriptors.notes: In this game there are depictions of cartoon violence, weapons, blood, and drug usage
